* Represents an Event which inherits from Task and is stored/managed by Duke
* Stores the time the event is supposed to take place
* Creates an Event object with given description and time
*  Gives a string representation of the Event by building upon parent's representation method
* Represents a Task to be managed/stored by the command line application Duke
* Creates a new Task with the given description and sets isDone to false by default
* Gets the status icon of this Task based on whether it is done or not
* @return a String containing the status icon (tick-mark or cross)
* Marks this task as done by setting the isDone property to true
* Gives a string representation of the Task including the status icon
* @return a String representation of the task
* Represents a To-do which inherits from Task and is stored/managed by Duke
* Creates a To-Do object with given description.
* Gives a string representation of the To-do by building upon parent's representation method
